description.translate: Light, like a distant line, gets lost in the darkest emptiness.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Horizon du désespoir\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La lumière comme une ligne lointaine,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7se perde dans le néant le plus obscur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Light, like a distant line, gets\"}","{\"text\":\"§7lost in the darkest emptiness.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HAS§a2\"}"]}}
